Description.

"Forged in the fires of Mount Doom, worn by elite members of Starfeet Academy, this Wizard's tool is a valuable asset to any Jedi Knight."

"One day Kryzoid had eaten some Chipotle Jalapeno Taco's,  Later that day his butt set ablaze with the Fires of Hell itself, He ran to the bathroom and took a massive firey poop. From this poop Came this Flaming Hat...Kryzoids destiny was determined to be a FireFighter..An AssFireFighter
